revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=BroadMax |model=HSA300A-304 |revision=v1 (??) |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=EoL |est_release_date=04/2003 |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |us_id=BMXDL01B123750403 |type=dsl modem |pwr_v=7.5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Globespan Virata |cpu1_model=GS8120;GS8120-174-008D, 0303, FB1407.1-A4, Taiwan; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT45DB161B-TC |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16400A-7T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=LSI |eth_chip2_model=L80225/B;LSI LOGIC, L80225/B, T 0311, WJF11824, KOREA; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:04:A8 }} A date code of '''1603''' is silkscreened on one HSA300A-304's board :(that is, the one populating this entry).
*[https://wiki.sonic.net/wiki/Broadmax_HSA300A-304 ''Broadmax HSA300A-304'' on the '''Sonic''' Wiki]
